hooks.command:
cat << 'EOF' 1>&2
Reminder: Sync all current todos to .ai/scratch/todo.md
- Use proper markdown checkbox syntax (- [ ] for incomplete, - [x] for completed)
- Do not delete any existing tasks - only update their status or add new tasks
- Document any sidequests or tangential work (like setup, configuration, debugging) as separate tasks
- When a task is completed by a git commit, add an indented line below it:
  - [commit message first line](https://github.com/nsheaps/dotfiles/commit/COMMIT_HASH)
- To get the commit hash: git log -1 --format='%H %s'
- After updating, consider using /commit to checkpoint changes
EOF

cat << EOF 1>&2
Don't forget to keep these files up to date:
- .ai/scratch/questions.md
- .ai/scratch/todo.md
- .ai/scratch/questions.md
EOF
